work_habits.communication_style: Async‑first, with brief syncs when needed
work_habits.response_time_expectation: Within 4 business hours for async messages
work_habits.meeting_preferences: Limit to 2 meetings per day; prefers 15‑minute stand‑ups; avoids large, unstructured meetings
work_habits.focus_time_requirements: 3‑4 hours of uninterrupted focus each workday

personality.decision_making_approach: Data‑driven with stakeholder input; uses weighted scoring matrices
personality.risk_tolerance: Moderate‑high (willing to pilot new tech if ROI justified)
personality.collaboration_style: Structured, cross‑functional; sets clear RACI matrices
personality.stress_management_approach: Morning run, weekly mindfulness session, regular vacation blocks

other_commitments: Board member of Seattle Tech Non‑Profit
availability.travel_flexibility: Moderate (up to 15% travel, primarily conferences and client visits)

personal_factors.health_considerations: Mild hypertension, monitors blood pressure via wearable
personal_factors.career_motivation: Passion for building scalable platforms and mentoring the next generation of engineering leaders

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: 2‑3 short syncs per week + weekly 1‑hour team stand‑up
collaboration.feedback_style: Direct yet respectful; prefers data‑backed observations
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: Writes monthly technical blog posts, hosts quarterly brown‑bag sessions, maintains internal wiki

potential_bottlenecks: Dependence on legacy monolith migration timeline
burnout_risk_factors: High meeting load during release cycles
Limited delegation during strategic planning phases
